title: Implement tk detach command
description:
Add 'tk detach' command to remove attachments from ticks.

## Command

```bash
tk detach <tick-id> <attachment-id>

# Example
tk detach abc a1b2
```

## Implementation

1. Load tick
2. Find attachment by ID
3. Remove from tick.Attachments
4. Save tick
5. Output confirmation

## Notes

- Does NOT delete from R2 (orphaned files cleaned up separately, or never)
- Simple implementation: just removes metadata from tick JSON
- Future: optional --delete flag to also remove from R2

## Output

```
Detached a1b2: screenshot.png from abc
```
